casebody.data:
Commonwealth of PUERTO RICO, et al., petitioners,
v.
FRANKLIN CALIFORNIA TAX-FREE TRUST, et al. No. 15-233. Supreme Court of the United States Dec. 4, 2015.

Motion of Fundacion Angel Ramos, Inc., et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae in No. 15-233 granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the First Circuit granted. The case is consolidated and a total of one hour is allotted for oral argument.

Justice ALITO took no part in the consideration or decision of this motion and this petition.
